title: 1-Month Free & 1/2 Off Your Deposit! Tour our 3-Bedroom
body:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
Choose redefined living, choose Silverstone Apartments and Townhomes. Only two miles from UC Davis, our one, two, and three-bedroom floor plans ensure a fresh rental experience with renovated interiors and sophisticated finishes. Add to this our fun recreational spaces and pet policy with no weight restrictions, and it all becomes clear; this is the ultimate choice for resident-focused and pet-friendly apartments in Davis!
Apartment Amenities
Quartz Counter-tops • In Unit Washer and Dryer • Hardwood Inspired Floors • Private Patio or Balcony • Central Heat and Air • Stainless Steel Appliances Including Microwave
Davis, CA, Apartments for Rent
Indulge in the simple pleasures of life. Take a few dips in the pool, relax your muscles in the spa, and train your physique in the 24-hour fitness center. After that, you can prepare a post-workout meal at the barbeque stations. And while you can stay up to date thanks to the Wi-Fi available throughout our premises, our team is ready to address your maintenance requests whenever needed.
There’s no better place than home when you live at Silverstone. The interiors flex open-concept designs, allowing you to move around freely as you go about your daily activities. That could mean anything from loading laundry in the washer/dryer sets, arranging your outfits in the spacious closets, or cooking with the help of stainless-steel appliances. There are also air conditioners for optimal airflow and hardwood-inspired floors for an extra ounce of style. And thanks to the private patios or balconies, you can enjoy the fresh Davis breeze from your apartment.
You can easily make your way to your destinations in Davis from our apartments for rent, whether you’re heading to your classes, attending an art exhibit, or want to shop locally. The University of California - Davis, the John Natsoulas Center of the Arts, and Davis Farmers Market are some nearby highlights, among many others.
Book a tour and make one of your best decisions yet!
In-unit Washer and Dryer in every apartment home!
Want to see more? Give us a call and take a tour of your new home today.

Parkside Apartments offers a beautiful downstairs 3 Bedroom, 2 Bath, approximately 1020 Sq. Ft. apartments available for 7/9/24 move in.
Please check us out at www.parkside-apartments.com
Parkside offers an ideal location in Davis, CA with spacious apartment homes for lease, we are also conveniently placed near the UCD campus. While living at Parkside you can take advantage of the highly acclaimed Davis Joint Unified School District.
At Parkside you will feel at home within our beautifully landscaped park-like grounds. We have an extensive list of amenities for you to enjoy; to include a fully-equipped fitness center, a large lavish pool area that includes our year-round heated spa. You may also enjoy using our relaxing gas fire pit or cooking at our outdoor gas grills that are available throughout the community. Rest assured your pets are welcome at Parkside for a small deposit. Come make Parkside your Home!

If you don't have a car, don't worry! Were located right on the Q, and P bus line, allowing everyone convenient transportation around town. The Edge is right around the corner to El Macero Center which includes Nugget Market, Starbucks, and several amazing eateries ranging from pizza to Mexican to Japanese bistro.Meeting new people in a small rural/suburban town like Davis can be difficult, and The Edge Apartments were designed with this fact in mind. We offer our resident community several amenities to help foster a sense of community and togetherness. With a residential swimming pool and hot tub, poolside cabana, lounge area complete with pool table, basketball court, and BBQ stations, you'll always be able to kick back and relax with good company without leaving the premises. Need a quiet place to work or study for that final exam, book up in our on-site business center/study lounge so you can work in tranquility. Our more active residents can pop into our 24-hour on-site fitness studio for when they want to get a quick workout in between classes. body:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
Parkside Apartments offers a beautiful downstairs 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 615 Sq. Ft. apartments available for 6/21/24 move in
Please check us out at www.parkside-apartments.com
Parkside offers an ideal location in Davis, CA with spacious apartment homes for lease, we are also conveniently placed near the UCD campus. While living at Parkside you can take advantage of the highly acclaimed Davis Joint Unified School District.
At Parkside you will feel at home within our beautifully landscaped park-like grounds. We have an extensive list of amenities for you to enjoy; to include a fully-equipped fitness center, a large lavish pool area that includes our year-round heated spa. You may also enjoy using our relaxing gas fire pit or cooking at our outdoor gas grills that are available throughout the community. Rest assured your pets are welcome at Parkside for a small deposit. Come make Parkside your Home!
Apartment Amenities
• Electric range
• Refrigerator
• Garbage Disposal
• Dishwasher
• Heat and Air Conditioning
• Carpeting or wood-inspired vinyl flooring
• Large walk-in hall storage closet (In the 3-bedroom floor plans)
• AT&T Ultra-High-Speed Fiber Internet Access
• Comcast Cable TV/Internet Access
• Private Patio or Balcony
• Bright and Airy Floor-plans with Windows in Every Room
• Window Coverings, Blinds
Community Amenities
• Outdoor Fire-pit with Seating Area
• Arbor picnic table area with multiple gas grills
• Outdoor picnic table areas with charcoal grills throughout the property
• Resident Club House with Billiards table
• Refreshing Oversized Pool and Spa
• Fully Equipped Fitness Facility
• Complimentary coffee bar & computer/printer privileges in the clubhouse
• Free off-street parking
• 24-hour Clothing Care Center ($1.50 per load) use your credit/debit card or Apple Pay
• Submit repair requests on-line
• 24-Hour Emergency Maintenance
• Pay rent online with Credit Card or E-Checks
• Close to Public Transportation Uni-trans lines E, F, P, and Q to UC Davis (10-12 min bus ride)
Yolo Bus lines to Sacramento, Woodland, etc.
We are open Monday through Friday from 9 am to 6 pm & Saturday 8 am to 5pm. We also offer other floor plans, please call for details.
This ad is updated periodically please check our website www.parkside-apartments.com for the most up to date (live time) rates. Prices and availability are subject to change without notice.
Equal Opportunity Housing Provider

title: Immediate Move In Available!
body:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
Pinecrest is conveniently located just steps from the Davis Unitrans E bus line and is approximately one mile from the UC Davis campus
Pinecrest Apartments
920 Cranbrook Court
Davis, CA 95616
Have any questions? Let our friendly staff give you more information or set up a tour today!
Give us a call:  show contact info

Visit us online: http://www.pinecrest-davis.com/t/ad?ref=417e7b0b17f0e53d2797565a4d3e204e
Shaded by tall trees and brimming with great amenities, Pinecrest Apartments stands as a powerhouse of modern comforts in downtown Davis. Scroll below to learn all about the features of our apartments in Central Davis, CA, then get ready for an exciting new lifestyle. You’ll find us right off the bike lane along East Covell Boulevard, within a short walk of Community Park and Oak Tree Plaza.
Apartment Amenities
Refrigerator • Air Conditioner • Large Closets • Kitchen Pantry • Ceiling Fan • Microwave • Cable Ready • Dishwasher
Refined Amenities in Davis, CA
As you stroll past the lush landscaping and dive into the sparkling pool, you know that life rarely gets better than this. You also have a picnic area for barbecue get-togethers and a fitness center where you can achieve your workout goals. And don’t worry if you need to wash your clothes afterward – that’s what the laundry facilities are for! Plus, our on-site staff are at your call.
Open the door to your apartment in Davis, step onto the hardwood-style flooring, and start afresh with feeling. Let the air conditioner and ceiling fan team up against the California sun while you organize your belongings in the large closet. All that’s left to do is stock up the pantry and get cooking in your open kitchen, complete with stainless-steel appliances such as a dishwasher and a microwave.
Our location crowns this list of amenities, placing you right off J Street and only a few minutes away from UC Davis. Covell Park is a wonderful place to explore alongside your furry companion and Nugget Markets is a treasure trove for those who enjoy preparing their own meals. In addition, bus lines E and T offer an eco-friendly mode of transportation, while Interstate 80 puts West Sacramento within a 15-mile radius.
Let’s set the stage for something great. Call us now for a tour of our apartments in Central Davis, California!
Stop by our office to take a tour of our beautiful homes!
Mon-Fri: 9AM-6PM
Saturday: 9AM-4PM
We are a pet-friendly community, but for the safety and comfort of all our residents, breed restrictions apply
Pets - allowed, Cats - 2 allowed, Rent $30.00, Deposit $500.00, Dogs - 2 allowed, Rent $30.00, Deposit $500.00, Comments: Breed restrictions apply.  A deposit and rent charge is required for each pet.

Welcome to a bright & spacious 4 bed/3 bath home (pets ok) in the Cannery District of Davis.
Location, location, location!  Only a 13 min bike ride to campus and easy access to highway for commutes to Travis, Sac, Bay.
Tenancy includes access to the Cannery pool playground & clubhouse (all 1/2 block away). 
Inside the house, you’ll find fresh paint, high ceilings, new carpet, double paned windows w/louvered windows & recessed lighting.

Bedrooms # 2 & #3 (upstairs) each feature a generous closet and share a bath w/bath tub. 
The Master bedroom includes space for King size bed (or two full sized beds), double sinks, split bath & large walk-in closet. 
Cook’s kitchen boasts newer appliances, extra large breakfast bar & tons of storage. 
Dining area seats 10 & opens to an outdoor entertainment space w/ a gas fireplace, space for a grill and bar. 
Living room easily accommodates 80 inch couch, a media center and a couple of armchairs.  
Rental includes a laundry room w/newer washer/dryer; 2 car garage. Don't miss out on this ideal rental, available immediately.

 x 5OR Text 5 to  show contact info
 to text our leasing team. Community Info:The Edge Apartments are located just a short 10-minute drive from the UC Davis campus (talk about a short commute!). If you don't have a car, don't worry! Were located right on the Q, and P bus line, allowing everyone convenient transportation around town. The Edge is right around the corner to El Macero Center which includes Nugget Market, Starbucks, and several amazing eateries ranging from pizza to Mexican to Japanese bistro.Meeting new people in a small rural/suburban town like Davis can be difficult, and The Edge Apartments were designed with this fact in mind. We offer our resident community several amenities to help foster a sense of community and togetherness. With a residential swimming pool and hot tub, poolside cabana, lounge area complete with pool table, basketball court, and BBQ stations, you'll always be able to kick back and relax with good company without leaving the premises. Need a quiet place to work or study for that final exam, book up in our on-site business center/study lounge so you can work in tranquility. Our more active residents can pop into our 24-hour on-site fitness studio for when they want to get a quick workout in between classes. And yes; we are a pet-friendly community!Interested in more information? title: 5 bed house(4bed option as well)
body:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
CALL FOR FOR DETAILS.
I also have rooms available for rent in three different houses. Prices start at $850 per room. Each of the houses have different benefits. Please call for details. I will try to match you with the house that fits your needs, and the roommates that fit your style.
Right now we're offering 3 specials.
The regular rent is $5500, but you can get $1000 off for sharing with 1 absent roommate(currently only visits 2 days every other month). 
Also, get $400 off per month just paying on time, and for maintaining the house well for every month of the year.
Lastly, we have various forms of early move-in options.
Before we waste time…
Do you have weirdness? We may still rent to you. Just let us know upfront. Examples...
Do you have multiple people for one room? Do you have pets? Do you have weird pets? Do you have multiple vehicles that you're trying to bring to a multi person house? Are you asking for a deferred payment? Are you asking for work trade? Do you absolutely have to hang a naked picture of Joe Biden on the living room wall?
OK, that last one is really a decision that your roommates will have to approve. I really couldn't care less.
The point is, I try not to disqualify anyone for these sorts of things. But I do need to know in order to fit a group together that will get along. I.e. Only one of the houses is OK with dogs. Only one of the houses has an inconvenience discount. Only one of the houses has a flexible room discount. Neither house accepts smokers. Only one of the houses has a double occupancy option in one of the rooms. Only one of the houses is OK with undergrads. Etc.
Also note: if you have NONE of these issues, that's great. Your application process will be faster and easier.
The rooms range from 90 ft.² to 240 ft.² Each house has been completely remodeled, and has several additional benefits above and beyond standard amenities. 
Furniture available. Furniture use is free, But you are responsible for damage.
Note: I also have larger houses in Davis
Woodland house:
5 bedroom house
Newly remodeled 
New appliances
New a/c, furnace
Efficient Woodstove(firewood available for free)
High efficiency windows, fixtures, etc. Additional insulation recently added
4+ off street parking spaces
2+ on street spaces
Ethernet/cable routed to each room
Listed prices are monthly; length of lease is yearly.
Tahoe vacation rentals available for free.(for ski trips, parties, etc.)
careered individuals preferred(Grad students ok) 
No application fee as long as tenants commit to renting the house. More details available when showing houses.
CALL for details. My texts are unreliable, and I don't check email often. Please CALL. 
Thanks, Mike

Please check us out at www.parkside-apartments.com
Parkside offers an ideal location in Davis, CA with spacious apartment homes for lease, we are also conveniently placed near the UCD campus. While living at Parkside you can take advantage of the highly acclaimed Davis Joint Unified School District.
At Parkside you will feel at home within our beautifully landscaped park-like grounds. We have an extensive list of amenities for you to enjoy; to include a fully-equipped fitness center, a large lavish pool area that includes our year-round heated spa. • Garbage Disposal

• Private Patio or Balcony
• Bright and Airy Floor-plans with Windows in Every Room
• Window Coverings, Blinds

body:

Located in the popular green and energy efficient community The Cannery, this largest model and end unit Heirloom Plan 4 townhouse offers 4 bedrooms, 3.5 baths and 2 car garage with two master suites on 2nd and 3rd floor. Energy efficient features include but not limited to owned solar, tankless water heater and EV charging plug-in ready outlet. All community amenities are within just few minutes walking distance: heated swimming pool/spa, club house, BBQs, parks, playground, dog park, basketball court, outdoor exercise equipment, greenbelts, etc. The Cannery is conveniently and centrally located in North Davis with a close proximity to North Davis Elementary, Holmes Junior High and Davis Senior High Schools, library, Art Center, Veterans Memorial Center Theatre, shoppings, downtown and UC Davis.
Renters are responsible for utilities. No smoking allowed. Pets are permitted on a case-by-case basis with an additional deposit.

Parkside Apartments offers a beautiful downstairs 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 615 Sq. Ft. apartments.
Parkside offers an ideal location in Davis, CA with spacious apartment homes for lease, we are also conveniently placed near the UCD campus. While living at Parkside you can take advantage of the highly acclaimed Davis Joint Unified School District.
At Parkside you will feel at home within our beautifully landscaped park-like grounds. We have an extensive list of amenities for you to enjoy; including a fully equipped fitness center and a large lavish pool area that includes our year-round heated spa. You may also enjoy using our relaxing gas fire pit or cooking at our outdoor gas grills that are available throughout the community. Rest assured your pets are welcome at Parkside for a small deposit. Come make Parkside your Home!

• Electric range

• Garbage Disposal

• Bright and Airy floor plans with Windows in Every Room

Shaded by tall trees and brimming with great amenities, Pinecrest Apartments stands as a powerhouse of modern comforts in downtown Davis. Scroll below to learn all about the features of our apartments in Central Davis, CA, then get ready for an exciting new lifestyle. You’ll find us right off the bike lane along East Covell Boulevard, within a short walk of Community Park and Oak Tree Plaza.
Community Amenities
Laundry Facilities • Sparkling Pool • Wireless Internet • Available 24/7 to assist you • BBQ/Picnic Area • On-Site Maintenance • On-Site Management • Online Resident Portal • Near Public Transportation • Near Bike Path • Fitness Center
Apartment Amenities
Harwood Inspired Flooring • Refrigerator • Air Conditioner • Large Closets • Kitchen Pantry • Ceiling Fan • Microwave • Cable Ready • Dishwasher
Refined Amenities in Davis, CA
As you stroll past the lush landscaping and dive into the sparkling pool, you know that life rarely gets better than this. You also have a picnic area for barbecue get-togethers and a fitness center where you can achieve your workout goals. And don’t worry if you need to wash your clothes afterward – that’s what the laundry facilities are for! Plus, our on-site staff are at your call.
Open the door to your apartment in Davis, step onto the hardwood-style flooring, and start afresh with feeling. Let the air conditioner and ceiling fan team up against the California sun while you organize your belongings in the large closet. All that’s left to do is stock up the pantry and get cooking in your open kitchen, complete with stainless-steel appliances such as a dishwasher and a microwave.
Our location crowns this list of amenities, placing you right off J Street and only a few minutes away from UC Davis. Covell Park is a wonderful place to explore alongside your furry companion and Nugget Markets is a treasure trove for those who enjoy preparing their own meals. In addition, bus lines E and T offer an eco-friendly mode of transportation, while Interstate 80 puts West Sacramento within a 15-mile radius.
Let’s set the stage for something great. Call us now for a tour of our apartments in Central Davis, California!
At Pinecrest Apartments, we have fantastic, newly renovated one- and two-bedroom apartment homes! Our homes feature stainless steel appliances, beautiful quartz counter tops and beautful new flooring throughout. There is an abundance of storage in our homes with large standard closets and walk-in closets. The eat-in breakfast nook is the perfect space saving design that also dramatically increases your counter space.

Our apartment homes are newly renovated and include wood style floors, high 9 foot ceilings, central heat/air, private balcony/patio, fully equipped kitchens with all stainless-steel appliances, granite countertops, and a soft water filtration system for all units! Our community includes a 24 hour fitness center, sparkling pool, and a relaxing spa.We look forward to making The Seville at Mace Ranch Apartments your new home!!Apartment Features:MicrowaveDishwasherBuilt-In Window CoveringsPrivate Patio or BalconyWasher & DryerCeiling Fan/sSizable ClosetsFurnished InteriorCommunity Features:Resort-Style Amenity CollectionPet-Friendly Community w/ On-Site Bark ParkResort-Worthy Swimming Pool & SundeckContemporary Fitness Center w/ Free WeightsLocated Near Unitrans & Yolo Transit TransportationOutdoor Barbeque Grilling Stations & Picnic Area24/7 Access Package LockersOn-Site Management & Maintenance TeamCall:  show contact info

Our community’s one and two-bedroom floor plans offer a wide variety of amenities and services such as central heat and air and modern appliances. In addition, Renaissance Park has a 24-hour state of the art fitness center, a Sparkling pool, an exciting clubhouse with WiFi, study lounge, and pool table. Best of all, we have unlimited parking! Please check us out at www.parkside-apartments.com
Parkside offers an ideal location in Davis, CA with spacious apartment homes for lease, we are also conveniently placed near the UCD campus. While living at Parkside you can take advantage of the highly acclaimed Davis Joint Unified School District.
At Parkside you will feel at home within our beautifully landscaped park-like grounds. We have an extensive list of amenities for you to enjoy; to include a fully-equipped fitness center, a large lavish pool area that includes our year-round heated spa. You may also enjoy using our relaxing gas fire pit or cooking at our outdoor gas grills that are available throughout the community. Rest assured your pets are welcome at Parkside for a small deposit. Come make Parkside your Home!

• Electric range

• Garbage Disposal

• Heat and Air Conditioning

• Bright and Airy Floor-plans with Windows in Every Room

No shoe, OPEN HOUSE, Sunday, June 9, 2024 promptly at  3:10 PM.
PLEASE READ ENTIRE DESCRIPTION: 
This home/neighborhood is brand new and GPS will take you to the wrong location.  From I80, go eastbound on W A St, turn right on Evans Road, left on Butterfly Lane, then your 2nd left to Orchid Ave.
We DO NOT accept applications through Zillow, AffordableHousing or other websites except our own, Tri-CityProperties
Posting for Tri-City Properties. All inquiries can be emailed to Tri-CityProperties at sbcglobal dot net . Check out more information and photos at www tri-cityproperties dot com     Do not disturb current occupants.
Make sure you are speaking directly with Tri-City Properties at 840-A Lovers Lane, Vacaville or on our company phone. We have recently been made aware that scammers have contacted those that comment on our adds/posts, pretending to be our agent, and try to get money out of people desperate for a rental home. We will NEVER ask for money until we are in a legitimate lease agreement with an applicant, other than a small application fee of $10. DO NOT give money or personal information to anyone you are unsure about.

Renaissance Park is nestled in a quiet, park like setting just minutes away from UC Davis. Renaissance Park is located nearby shopping areas, only 1/4 mile away from I-80 and minutes from Highway 113, and on Davis bus lines P, Q, and W.
Our community’s one and two-bedroom floor plans offer a wide variety of amenities and services such as central heat and air and modern appliances. In addition, Renaissance Park has a 24-hour state of the art fitness center, a Sparkling pool, an exciting clubhouse with WiFi, study lounge, and pool table. Best of all, we have unlimited parking! Please contact us and we will gladly answer any questions you might have.
Renaissance Park Apartments surpasses all expectations in terms of bikeability, comfort, convenience, and lifestyle. Our South Davis apartments are outfitted with premium fixtures that harmonize with a wide array of amenities, providing a living experience that caters to your every need, along with a central address only 10 minutes away from UC Davis.
Apartment Amenities
Wood Inspired Flooring • Washer/Dryer in Select Homes • Refrigerator • Private Patio or Balcony • Built-in Dining Table • Central Heat and Air • Dishwasher • Cable Ready
Unmatched Apartments in South Davis
Unwind on your patio or balcony with a glass of wine – the perfect end to any day. During your downtime, take advantage of our amazing amenities to live it up! Head to the 24-hour fitness center for a heart-pumping workout. Soak up the vibrant vibes of our green courtyard, or gather with neighbors over perfectly charred BBQ in the picnic area. Need to focus? Our study lounge offers complimentary snacks, coffee, and high-speed Wi-Fi. Your convenience is our priority, so we've included a resident portal, a designated car washing area, and free parking. On-site management and maintenance services provide that extra peace of mind. Make our South Davis apartments for rent your new home!
The extensive list of benefits continues with a highly convenient address. Renaissance Park connects you to Oakshade Town Center, local pubs, trendy eateries, and Downtown Sacramento via I-80. Whether you spend time at home or explore the city, one thing is for sure: there’s never a dull moment inside our pet-friendly apartments in Davis.
Stop by today and see for yourself how Renaissance Park Apartments brings a sense of community and privacy together. Contact us today for more information about our apartments in Davis, CA.
Beautiful Community located 1.82 miles from the UCD campus!
Renaissance Park Apartments
3000 Lillard Drive
Davis, CA 95618
We are open weekends - Come see us this Saturday!
Mon-Fri: 9AM-6PM
Sat - Sun: 10AM-4PM

body:

A 4-bed, 2-bath single-story house with a two-car garage (~1700 sq. ft.) in East Davis will be available on June 1st, or the move-in date can be flexible. The monthly rent is $3,950, which includes a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher, refrigerator, gas stove, microwave, washer/dryer, and heating/air conditioning. The house is located in a quiet neighborhood next to Wildhorse Golf Course. It is within biking distance to UCD, a few minutes' walk to shopping (Nugget Market), and the Unitrans L-line. It is also close to Birch Lane Elementary and Frances Harper Junior High.
Ceramic tile flooring covers the kitchen and bathroom areas, while hardwood floors are in all living areas.
Tenants are responsible for PG&E, utilities, and a $3,950 security deposit. A one-year lease is required. No pets, no drugs, and no smoking. Please email for further inquiries.

A 4-bed, 2-bath single-story house with a two-car garage (~1700 sq. ft.) in East Davis will be available on June 1st, or the move-in date can be flexible. The monthly rent is $3,950, which includes a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher, refrigerator, gas stove, microwave, washer/dryer, and heating/air conditioning. The house is located in a quiet neighborhood next to Wildhorse Golf Course. It is within biking distance to UCD, a few minutes' walk to shopping (Nugget Market), and the Unitrans L-line. It is also close to Birch Lane Elementary and Frances Harper Junior High. Ceramic tile flooring covers the kitchen and bathroom areas, while hardwood floors are in all living areas.
Tenants are responsible for PG&E, utilities, and a $3,950 security deposit. A one-year lease is required. No pets, no drugs, and no smoking. Please email for further inquiries.

body:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
This is a rare opening in the Stonegate Village complex in West Davis. It is a fantastic two-story townhouse on the second/third floor facing the UCD Crops, Olive Lane, Bee Sanctuary, and the Yolo County Airport. The Unitrans Bus stop is only yards away from the property and can connect you to all of Davis and the larger region. Public transportation in Davis and Yolo is terrific!
https://www.stonegatevillageapt.com
Treehouse living with amazing views and all the amenities of one of the best properties in Davis has the wonderful Stonegate Country Club membership for everyone on the unit lease for only $50 a month.  (XL heated pool, allowing year-round swimming :)
https://stonegatecc.com/
Stonegate Village is in such high demand,  with a high % of the residents being Grad Vet students, only 1 1/2 miles from UCD Campus... that they don't pay to advertise the property, so won't see on a lot of Davis or Yolo rental listings
I hadn't planned on leaving, but a dream job came my way, I have loved living here for the last 8 years.. It's super hard to give up; like living in the country but still in Davis.
If you can move in July or August, you can apply for a lease takeover, which will give you my rate of 2120 instead of 2650. This rate will be until August 2025, when it will increase only a % compared to new tenants.  If you are willing to take the place "As Is" (meaning no new paint or new flooring), you won't need to put down the 1500 deposit. I will transfer my deposit to your account and since I have lived there over 5 years, there won't be paint or flooring fees when you move out.
The bedrooms on the third floor are very large, and for many years, one of them was divided into two smaller rooms with double bunk beds in both. The other one has a large loft, and I have a large library of books in this space. It is also large enough for two beds but not currently set up that way.  If someone really loves the lofts or bunkbeds, might be willing to sell or work something out since we are not 100% on our new living space.
West Manner Park is right across the street from the complex. It has tennis courts, a play structure, a large activity field, and a preschool. The Davis Bike Path, which loops the entire town, is also right across from the complex. Both Patwin Elementary School and Emerson Junior High School are within biking/walking distance. Both my kids ride or scooter to school independently on the bike path. It's a very safe neighborhood.
I am still working out my move plans; I just signed my new contract this morning. :) But I wanted to get this out there right away. I know how hard it is for a family to find an affordable place in Davis; being so much under the market rate should help you get settled in your new community.
If interested please email.  Since this is still a private residence, I will send pictures to only those serious about moving in.

Only two miles from UC Davis, our one, two, and three-bedroom floor plans ensure a fresh rental experience with renovated interiors and sophisticated finishes. Add to this our fun recreational spaces and pet policy with no weight restrictions, and it all becomes clear; this is the ultimate choice for resident-focused and pet-friendly apartments in Davis!Community AmenitiesPool and Spa • Poolside Gas Barbecue • WiFi in Common Area • State of the Art Fitness Center • Convenient Access to Public Transportation • Convenient Freeway Access • Adjacent to Retail Shopping, Dining, and Parks • Online Resident Payment Portal • Emergency Maintenance ServicesApartment AmenitiesQuartz Counter-tops • In Unit Washer and Dryer • Open Floorplans • Hardwood Inspired Floors • Spacious Closets • Private Patio or Balcony • Custom Cabinetry • Central Heat and Air • Two Tone Paint • Stainless Steel Appliances Including Microwave • Ceiling FanDavis, CA, Apartments for Rent Indulge in the simple pleasures of life. And while you can stay up to date thanks to the Wi-Fi available throughout our premises, our team is ready to address your maintenance requests whenever needed.There’s no better place than home when you live at Silverstone. Hey everyone. 
Housing available located in Central Davis, very close to Trader Joe's and campus. 
Rent is $900 plus utilities for singles shared bathroom and $1100(master bedroom) plus utilities. for the master bedroom. Utilities are calculated per quarter (i.e: every 3 months) and usually are around $280 more or less depending on usage (~$80-100 a month). House is 4 bed, 3 full bath, and we're looking to fill 3 rooms right now. 
Rooms furnished. Master bedroom will not be furnished. 
Move in date is 9/1/24 (possibly earlier). ~7/1/24 for the master. 
Looking for people with similar habits: clean, NO 420/drinking, people who are quiet and friendly. There will be 1 gal staying. Message me for more details if you're interested.
Will be interviewing candidates, just a general standard get to know you, so when messaging, send times you are available for a zoom call.
Cross posted on Facebook if you’d like more information

ONE MONTH FREE FOR IMMEDIATE MOVE IN
Shaded by tall trees and brimming with great amenities, Pinecrest Apartments stands as a powerhouse of modern comforts in downtown Davis. Scroll below to learn all about the features of our apartments in Central Davis, CA, then get ready for an exciting new lifestyle. You’ll find us right off the bike lane along East Covell Boulevard, within a short walk of Community Park and Oak Tree Plaza.
Apartment Amenities
Refrigerator • Air Conditioner • Large Closets • Kitchen Pantry • Ceiling Fan • Microwave • Cable Ready • Dishwasher
Refined Amenities in Davis, CA
As you stroll past the lush landscaping and dive into the sparkling pool, you know that life rarely gets better than this. You also have a picnic area for barbecue get-togethers and a fitness center where you can achieve your workout goals. And don’t worry if you need to wash your clothes afterward – that’s what the laundry facilities are for! Plus, our on-site staff are at your call.
Open the door to your apartment in Davis, step onto the hardwood-style flooring, and start afresh with feeling. Let the air conditioner and ceiling fan team up against the California sun while you organize your belongings in the large closet. All that’s left to do is stock up the pantry and get cooking in your open kitchen, complete with stainless-steel appliances such as a dishwasher and a microwave.
Our location crowns this list of amenities, placing you right off J Street and only a few minutes away from UC Davis. Covell Park is a wonderful place to explore alongside your furry companion and Nugget Markets is a treasure trove for those who enjoy preparing their own meals. In addition, bus lines E and T offer an eco-friendly mode of transportation, while Interstate 80 puts West Sacramento within a 15-mile radius.
Let’s set the stage for something great. Call us now for a tour of our apartments in Central Davis, California!
Pinecrest is a beautiful apartment complex just outside of Downtown Davis. Our location allows our residents easy access to all the town has to offer while providing a quiet, secluded location. Settled on eight acres of land, the homes at Pinecrest are surrounded by large lawns and aged trees that provide essential shade during the summer.
To add to this serene feeling, we offer cottage style homes which have the same floor plans but are a single story. This means that no one lives above you and you get both the ease of living on the first floor and the beauty of vaulted ceilings!
Want to see more? Give us a call and take a tour of your new home today!

Shaded by tall trees and brimming with great amenities, Pinecrest Apartments stands as a powerhouse of modern comforts in downtown Davis. Scroll below to learn all about the features of our apartments in Central Davis, CA, then get ready for an exciting new lifestyle. You’ll find us right off the bike lane along East Covell Boulevard, within a short walk of Community Park and Oak Tree Plaza.
Community Amenities
Laundry Facilities • Sparkling Pool • Wireless Internet • BBQ/Picnic Area • Near Public Transportation • Near Bike Path • Fitness Center
Refined Amenities in Davis, CA
As you stroll past the lush landscaping and dive into the sparkling pool, you know that life rarely gets better than this. You also have a picnic area for barbecue get-togethers and a fitness center where you can achieve your workout goals. And don’t worry if you need to wash your clothes afterward – that’s what the laundry facilities are for! Plus, our on-site staff are at your call.
Open the door to your apartment in Davis, step onto the hardwood-style flooring, and start afresh with feeling. Let the air conditioner and ceiling fan team up against the California sun while you organize your belongings in the large closet. All that’s left to do is stock up the pantry and get cooking in your open kitchen, complete with stainless-steel appliances such as a dishwasher and a microwave.
Our location crowns this list of amenities, placing you right off J Street and only a few minutes away from UC Davis. Covell Park is a wonderful place to explore alongside your furry companion and Nugget Markets is a treasure trove for those who enjoy preparing their own meals. In addition, bus lines E and T offer an eco-friendly mode of transportation, while Interstate 80 puts West Sacramento within a 15-mile radius.
Let’s set the stage for something great. Call us now for a tour of our apartments in Central Davis, California!

Shaded by tall trees and brimming with great amenities, Pinecrest Apartments stands as a powerhouse of modern comforts in downtown Davis. Scroll below to learn all about the features of our apartments in Central Davis, CA, then get ready for an exciting new lifestyle. You’ll find us right off the bike lane along East Covell Boulevard, within a short walk of Community Park and Oak Tree Plaza.
Community Amenities
Laundry Facilities • Sparkling Pool • Wireless Internet • Available 24/7 to assist you • BBQ/Picnic Area • On-Site Maintenance • On-Site Management • Online Resident Portal • Near Public Transportation • Near Bike Path • Fitness Center
Apartment Amenities
Harwood Inspired Flooring • Refrigerator • Air Conditioner • Large Closets • Kitchen Pantry • Ceiling Fan • Microwave • Cable Ready • Dishwasher
Refined Amenities in Davis, CA
As you stroll past the lush landscaping and dive into the sparkling pool, you know that life rarely gets better than this. You also have a picnic area for barbecue get-togethers and a fitness center where you can achieve your workout goals. And don’t worry if you need to wash your clothes afterward – that’s what the laundry facilities are for! Plus, our on-site staff are at your call.
Open the door to your apartment in Davis, step onto the hardwood-style flooring, and start afresh with feeling. Let the air conditioner and ceiling fan team up against the California sun while you organize your belongings in the large closet. All that’s left to do is stock up the pantry and get cooking in your open kitchen, complete with stainless-steel appliances such as a dishwasher and a microwave.
Our location crowns this list of amenities, placing you right off J Street and only a few minutes away from UC Davis. Covell Park is a wonderful place to explore alongside your furry companion and Nugget Markets is a treasure trove for those who enjoy preparing their own meals. In addition, bus lines E and T offer an eco-friendly mode of transportation, while Interstate 80 puts West Sacramento within a 15-mile radius.
Let’s set the stage for something great. Call us now for a tour of our apartments in Central Davis, California!
Pinecrest is a beautiful apartment complex just outside of Downtown Davis. Our location allows our residents easy access to all the town has to offer while providing a quiet, secluded location. Settled on eight acres of land, the homes at Pinecrest are surrounded by large lawns and aged trees that provide essential shade during the summer.
To add to this serene feeling, we offer cottage style homes which have the same floor plans but are a single story. This means that no one lives above you and you get both the ease of living on the first floor and the beauty of vaulted ceilings!
Come by today and take a tour of your new apartment home!
Call us:  show contact info

Busy during the week? Not a problem! Our office is open Saturdays!
Mon-Fri: 9AM-6PM
Saturday: 9AM-4PM
Approximately one mile from the UC Davis campus, Pinecrest is conveniently located just steps from the Unitrans E bus line and is a very short walk from the P and Q lines!
Pinecrest Apartments
920 Cranbrook Court
Davis, CA 95616
We are a pet-friendly community, but for the safety and comfort of all our residents, breed restrictions apply
Pets - allowed, Cats - 2 allowed, Rent $30.00, Deposit $500.00, Dogs - 2 allowed, Rent $30.00, Deposit $500.00, Comments: Breed restrictions apply.  A deposit and rent charge is required for each pet.

We are a pet friendly community.Choose redefined living, choose Silverstone Apartments and Townhomes. Only two miles from UC Davis, our one, two, and three-bedroom floor plans ensure a fresh rental experience with renovated interiors and sophisticated finishes. Add to this our fun recreational spaces and pet policy with no weight restrictions, and it all becomes clear; this is the ultimate choice for resident-focused and pet-friendly apartments in Davis!Community AmenitiesState of the Art Fitness Center • WiFi in Common Area • Convenient Access to Public Transportation • Pool and SpaApartment AmenitiesQuartz Counter-tops • In Unit Washer and Dryer • Hardwood Inspired Floors • Private Patio or Balcony • Central Heat and Air • Stainless Steel Appliances Including MicrowaveDavis, CA, Apartments for Rent Indulge in the simple pleasures of life. Take a few dips in the pool, relax your muscles in the spa, and train your physique in the 24-hour fitness center. After that, you can prepare a post-workout meal at the barbeque stations. And while you can stay up to date thanks to the Wi-Fi available throughout our premises, our team is ready to address your maintenance requests whenever needed.There’s no better place than home when you live at Silverstone. The interiors flex open-concept designs, allowing you to move around freely as you go about your daily activities. That could mean anything from loading laundry in the washer/dryer sets, arranging your outfits in the spacious closets, or cooking with the help of stainless-steel appliances. There are also air conditioners for optimal airflow and hardwood-inspired floors for an extra ounce of style. And thanks to the private patios or balconies, you can enjoy the fresh Davis breeze from your apartment.You can easily make your way to your destinations in Davis from our apartments for rent, whether you’re heading to your classes, attending an art exhibit, or want to shop locally. Shaded by tall trees and brimming with great amenities, Pinecrest Apartments stands as a powerhouse of modern comforts in downtown Davis. Scroll below to learn all about the features of our apartments in Central Davis, CA, then get ready for an exciting new lifestyle. You’ll find us right off the bike lane along East Covell Boulevard, within a short walk of Community Park and Oak Tree Plaza.
Community Amenities
Laundry Facilities • Sparkling Pool • Wireless Internet • Available 24/7 to assist you • BBQ/Picnic Area • On-Site Maintenance • On-Site Management • Online Resident Portal • Near Public Transportation • Near Bike Path • Fitness Center
Apartment Amenities
Harwood Inspired Flooring • Refrigerator • Air Conditioner • Large Closets • Kitchen Pantry • Ceiling Fan • Microwave • Cable Ready • Dishwasher
Refined Amenities in Davis, CA
As you stroll past the lush landscaping and dive into the sparkling pool, you know that life rarely gets better than this. You also have a picnic area for barbecue get-togethers and a fitness center where you can achieve your workout goals. And don’t worry if you need to wash your clothes afterward – that’s what the laundry facilities are for! Plus, our on-site staff are at your call.
Open the door to your apartment in Davis, step onto the hardwood-style flooring, and start afresh with feeling. Let the air conditioner and ceiling fan team up against the California sun while you organize your belongings in the large closet. All that’s left to do is stock up the pantry and get cooking in your open kitchen, complete with stainless-steel appliances such as a dishwasher and a microwave.
Our location crowns this list of amenities, placing you right off J Street and only a few minutes away from UC Davis. Covell Park is a wonderful place to explore alongside your furry companion and Nugget Markets is a treasure trove for those who enjoy preparing their own meals. In addition, bus lines E and T offer an eco-friendly mode of transportation, while Interstate 80 puts West Sacramento within a 15-mile radius.
Let’s set the stage for something great. Call us now for a tour of our apartments in Central Davis, California!
Pinecrest is a beautiful apartment complex just outside of Downtown Davis. Our location allows our residents easy access to all the town has to offer while providing a quiet, secluded location. Settled on eight acres of land, the homes at Pinecrest are surrounded by large lawns and aged trees that provide essential shade during the summer.
To add to this serene feeling, we offer cottage style homes which have the same floor plans but are a single story. This means that no one lives above you and you get both the ease of living on the first floor and the beauty of vaulted ceilings!
Come by today and take a tour of your new apartment home!
Call us:  show contact info

Busy during the week? Not a problem! Our office is open Saturdays!
Mon-Fri: 9AM-6PM

Approximately one mile from the UC Davis campus, Pinecrest is conveniently located just steps from the Unitrans E bus line and is a very short walk from the P and Q lines!

920 Cranbrook Court
Davis, CA 95616

Renaissance Park is nestled in a quiet, park like setting just minutes away from UC Davis. Renaissance Park is located nearby shopping areas, only 1/4 mile away from I-80 and minutes from Highway 113, and on Davis bus lines P, Q, and W.
We boast a 24-hour state of the art fitness center, a Sparkling pool, an exciting clubhouse with WiFi, study lounge, and pool table. Best of all, we have unlimited parking!
Renaissance Park Apartments surpasses all expectations in terms of bikeability, comfort, convenience, and lifestyle. Our South Davis apartments are outfitted with premium fixtures that harmonize with a wide array of amenities, providing a living experience that caters to your every need, along with a central address only 10 minutes away from UC Davis.
Community Amenities
High Speed Wireless Internet • 24-Hour Fitness Center • BBQ/Picnic Area • Study Lounge • Business Center • Concierge
Unmatched Apartments in South Davis
Unwind on your patio or balcony with a glass of wine – the perfect end to any day. During your downtime, take advantage of our amazing amenities to live it up! Head to the 24-hour fitness center for a heart-pumping workout. Soak up the vibrant vibes of our green courtyard, or gather with neighbors over perfectly charred BBQ in the picnic area. Need to focus? Our study lounge offers complimentary snacks, coffee, and high-speed Wi-Fi. Your convenience is our priority, so we've included a resident portal, a designated car washing area, and free parking. On-site management and maintenance services provide that extra peace of mind. Make our South Davis apartments for rent your new home!
The extensive list of benefits continues with a highly convenient address. Renaissance Park connects you to Oakshade Town Center, local pubs, trendy eateries, and Downtown Sacramento via I-80. Whether you spend time at home or explore the city, one thing is for sure: there’s never a dull moment inside our pet-friendly apartments in Davis.
Stop by today and see for yourself how Renaissance Park Apartments brings a sense of community and privacy together. Contact us today for more information about our apartments in Davis, CA.

Parkside offers an ideal location in Davis, CA with spacious apartment homes for lease, we are also conveniently placed near the UCD campus. While living at Parkside you can take advantage of the highly acclaimed Davis Joint Unified School District.
At Parkside you will feel at home within our beautifully landscaped park-like grounds. We have an extensive list of amenities for you to enjoy; to include a fully-equipped fitness center, a large lavish pool area that includes our year-round heated spa. You may also enjoy using our relaxing gas fire pit or cooking at our outdoor gas grills that are available throughout the community. body:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
Pinecrest is a beautiful apartment complex just outside of Downtown Davis. Our location allows our residents easy access to all the town has to offer while providing a quiet, secluded location. Settled on eight acres of land, the homes at Pinecrest are surrounded by large lawns and aged trees that provide essential shade during the summer.
To add to this serene feeling, we offer cottage style homes which have the same floor plans but are a single story. This means that no one lives above you and you get both the ease of living on the first floor and the beauty of vaulted ceilings!
Shaded by tall trees and brimming with great amenities, Pinecrest Apartments stands as a powerhouse of modern comforts in downtown Davis. Scroll below to learn all about the features of our apartments in Central Davis, CA, then get ready for an exciting new lifestyle. You’ll find us right off the bike lane along East Covell Boulevard, within a short walk of Community Park and Oak Tree Plaza.
Community Amenities
Sparkling Pool • BBQ/Picnic Area • Near Bike Path • Fitness Center
Apartment Amenities
Refrigerator • Air Conditioner • Large Closets • Kitchen Pantry • Ceiling Fan • Dishwasher
Refined Amenities in Davis, CA
As you stroll past the lush landscaping and dive into the sparkling pool, you know that life rarely gets better than this. You also have a picnic area for barbecue get-togethers and a fitness center where you can achieve your workout goals. And don’t worry if you need to wash your clothes afterward – that’s what the laundry facilities are for! Plus, our on-site staff are at your call.
Open the door to your apartment in Davis, step onto the hardwood-style flooring, and start afresh with feeling. Let the air conditioner and ceiling fan team up against the California sun while you organize your belongings in the large closet. All that’s left to do is stock up the pantry and get cooking in your open kitchen, complete with stainless-steel appliances such as a dishwasher and a microwave.
Our location crowns this list of amenities, placing you right off J Street and only a few minutes away from UC Davis. Covell Park is a wonderful place to explore alongside your furry companion and Nugget Markets is a treasure trove for those who enjoy preparing their own meals. In addition, bus lines E and T offer an eco-friendly mode of transportation, while Interstate 80 puts West Sacramento within a 15-mile radius.
Let’s set the stage for something great. Call us now for a tour of our apartments in Central Davis, California!
Want to see more? Give us a call and take a tour of your new home today!
Call us at  show contact info

Or visit us online at http://www.pinecrest-davis.com/t/ad?ref=c69b24272173bab0a0f6023de40af8e4
Your pets are more than welcome here at Pinecrest!
Pets - allowed, Cats - 2 allowed, Rent $30.00, Deposit $500.00, Dogs - 2 allowed, Rent $30.00, Deposit $500.00, Comments: Breed restrictions apply.  A deposit and rent charge is required for each pet.
Come in today to learn more about our homes!
Mon-Fri: 9AM-6PM
Saturday: 9AM-4PM
Approximately one mile from the UC Davis campus, Pinecrest is conveniently located just steps from the Unitrans E bus line and is a very short walk from the P and Q lines!
Pinecrest Apartments
920 Cranbrook Court
Davis, CA 95616

QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
Parkside Apartments offers a beautiful upstairs 2 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 835 Sq. Ft. apartments. We have move in dates for July, August, and September please call for more info.
Please check us out at www.parkside-apartments.com
Parkside offers an ideal location in Davis, CA with spacious apartment homes for lease. Our great location is approximately one mile away from UC Davis Campus, and just minutes from the best dining and shopping in downtown Davis. While living at Parkside you can take advantage of the highly acclaimed Davis Joint Unified School District.
At Parkside you will feel at home within our beautifully landscaped park-like grounds. We have an extensive list of amenities for you to enjoy, including a fully equipped fitness center, a large 8-foot-deep pool, and our year-round heated spa. You may also enjoy using our relaxing gas fire pit or cooking at our outdoor gas grills. Rest assured your pets are welcome at Parkside for a small deposit. Come make Parkside your Home!
Apartment Amenities
• Electric range
• Refrigerator
• Garbage Disposal
• Dishwasher
• Central Heat and Air Conditioning (in 2, 3 and 4 bedrooms)
• Carpeting or wood-inspired vinyl flooring
• Large walk-in hall storage closet (In the 3-bedroom floor plans)
• AT&T Ultra-High-Speed Fiber Internet Access
• Comcast Cable TV/Internet Access
• Private Patio or Balcony
• Bright and Airy Floorplans with Windows in Every Room
• Window Coverings, Blinds
Community Amenities
• Outdoor Fire-pit with Seating Area
• Arbor picnic table area with multiple gas grills
• Outdoor picnic table areas with charcoal grills throughout the property
• Resident Club House with Billiards table
• Refreshing Oversized 8 -feet deep Pool and oversized Spa
• Fully Equipped Fitness Facility
• Complimentary coffee bar in the clubhouse
• Free off-street parking
• 24-hour Clothing Care Center ($1.50 per load) use your credit/debit card or Apple Pay
• Submit repair requests on-line
• 24-Hour Emergency Maintenance
• Pay rent online with Credit Card or E-Checks
• Close to Public Transportation Uni-trans lines E, F, P, and Q to UC Davis (10-12 min bus ride) Yolo bus lines to Woodland and Sacramento
We are open Monday through Friday from 9 am to 6 pm & Saturday 8 am to 5 pm call for an appointment to take a tour. Other floor plan sizes are available.
*Pricing and availability are subject to change daily. Photos may not be of the exact advertised unit. Contact us today for the most up-to-date information!
 Equal Opportunity Housing Provider
Professionally Managed by Broadway Management Company
